channel.title: How do i join a surver
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]how do i join some1 elses surver this site is so complicated. ive trying typing adreses inand usenames but it dont work?[/glow]

item.title: How do i join a surver
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Download moparscape 3.2 client here http://moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html .Then once thats installed open it up and type in a username and pass and for the ip go to the “help” tab at the top and click “server status” and pick a server thats on that you want to play,then type the ip of that server where it asks for the ip on moparscape and click login.The server status page is only about 50-75% accurate so it might say the server is on on the server status page when its really not,you just have to keep trying till you get in.For more server status pages go to www.dodian.com or www.rs-server.net

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join a surver

and put any name and pass and woulla your on a server.

caleb30 go too moparisthebest.com

item.title: How do i join a surver
item.dc:creator: @mr_streaky mr streaky
item.description:
@mr_streaky wrote:

have u got a survey adress?

l0l:

open up moparscape, and enter the person’s server address and create and account for that server buy entering a user name and a pass, and there you have it… your on somones server. but servers aren’t always online.

i just ttried that and it didnt work?
